local_intent: Execute the long diagonal push on the T-block after aligning and setting yaw, then confirm continued visibility.
assumptions: Post-push visibility of the block is used as a lightweight success proxy for this micro-step.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL_BT by re-perceiving the t_block, aligning with tight tolerance, setting yaw to 90°, performing the long push (0.2 @ 45° with 1200 ms), then verifying. This realizes the 'Push(long)' phase in the transfer step before the corrective push and goal check.
